articles.author: Giselle Ruhiyyih Ewing
articles.title: Carney voices support for Trump’s peace efforts — and encourages US security guarantees - Politico
articles.description: The Canadian leader’s message comes after several U.S. partners in Europe showed support for Trump’s trilateral proposal on Friday.
articles.content: Canada is closely co-ordinating with President Zelenskyy and our partners in the Coalition of the Willing to intensify our steadfast support for Ukraine and our shared commitment to its peace and sec… [+842 chars]
